licence_short_description: Licence to market, pack, re-pack, seal, re-seal, label, re-label seeds, prepare seed mixtures, or clean, treat or process seed for marketing.
overview: You need a licence to market, pack, re-pack, seal, re-seal, label, re-label seeds, prepare seed mixtures, or clean, treat or process seed for maketing
title: Seed marketing licence (England)
will_continue_on: the Food and Environment Research Agency website
